title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.10 - Notice and procedural rights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.10 - Notice and procedural rights

State Regulations

To the extent not inconsistent with this Part, all the
requirements in Part 358 of this Title concerning notice requirements and fair
hearings will apply to the same extent as they would apply to a person applying
for or in receipt of FA. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
366.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
